Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Zaton, kuća u nizu, 75 m2, bazen, 1250 m od mora! Dva komplesa montažnih kuća između kojih je zajednički bazen. Svaki kompleks sastoji se od četiri kuće u nizu. Trenutno je u prodaji šest kuća čiji je planiran završetak u rujnu 2025. Kupci mogu birati unutarnje uređenje kao standardno ili luksuzno, te o istom ovisi cijena. Cijene trenutno dostupnih kuća: 289.000,00 EUR 299.000,00 EUR 370.000,00 EUR 390.000,00 EUR 410.000,00 EUR 10% plaća se prilikom potpisivanja ugovora, ostatak: 30% prilikom završetka radova, 30% kod završetka opremanja, zadnjih 30% kod prijenosa vlasništva. Svaka kuća se sastoji od prizemlja s dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom, blagovaonicom i kupaonicom, te kata sa dvije spavaće sobe i kupaonicom. Kupaonica u prizemlju opremljena je tuš kabinom, dok se u gornjoj nalazi kada. U svim prostorijama osim spavaćih soba nalazi se podno grijanje, dok su spavaće sobe opremljene klima uređajima. Sobe nemaju rolete, dok će u prizemlju biti ugrađene rolete sa podizačima. Kuća je izolirana staklenom vunom debljine 10 cm, s odvodima na krovu. Svaka kuća ima osigurano jedno parkirno mjesto, a postoji mogućnost kupnje još jednog. Kontakt: vitanovanekretnine@gmail.com, 091/7677-657, 091/5699-347 Modern houses in Zaton, 10 km from Zadar, on the beautiful Croatian coast. Houses overlooking the forest and the Velebit mountains, close to luxury villas, 1.250 m form the sea. Private parking spaces and swimming pool available to residents. Access is 30 minutes from Zadar airport and the A1 motorway, 15 minutes on foot to the sea and beach. Houses with an area of 72 m2 + 3 m2 of utility room. Living room with kitchen and bathroom on the ground floor, 2 bedrooms and bathroom with bathtub on the first floor. Property nearby: - the historic town of Nin, - Zaton Holiday Resort campsite, - beautiful beaches, - the islands of Vir and Pag, - Velebit Mountains, - Krka National Park, - Slapovi Zrmanje waterfalls, - Zrmanje Proslavio canyon. Finished houses in developer standard (2 bathrooms, doors and floors). Underfloor heating, air conditioning with heating function in all rooms. Possibility of turnkey purchase according to two available arrangements in the Standard or Lux version. Also ideal as an investment (ROI rate of 7-9% per year depending on the type of rental). Professional and experienced tourist rental management services. Price from 289.000,00 EUR Terms of purchase: 10% - payable at the time of signing the reservation agreement, 30% - payable after bringing it to a shell state; 30% - payable after bringing it to the developer's condition; 30% - payable after completion of construction at the time of transfer of ownership of the property.
